name: @wavechat/root
description: A real time social media platform
author: FourLineCode

scripts.reset: pnpm clean && pnpm down && pnpm dep
scripts.dev:down: pnpm dep && pnpm down:volume && docker-compose up
scripts.dev:reset: pnpm dep && pnpm down:volume && docker-compose up --build
scripts.deploy: pnpm down:volume && docker-compose -f docker-compose.prod.yml up --scale wcp-api=2 --scale wcp-rtc=2
